title: A blessing to the soul ❤️ | #LoveStatus #MohMohKeDhaage #LoFiMix #Ayushmann Khurrana #BhumiPednekar
text: ► Subscribe Now: https://goo.gl/xs3mrY ???? Stay updated! ► YRF New Releases: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCB05E03DA939D484 LoFi Mix By: Jus Keys ???? Movie Credits: Starring: Ayushmann Khurrana, Bhumi Pednekar Writer-Director: Sharat Katariya Producer: Maneesh Sharma Music: Anu Malik Lyrics: Varun Grover Release Date: 27 February 2015 Watch all videos from the film 'Dum Laga Ke Haisha’ https://youtu.be/lFZpPpSU3k0?list=PLcVfz1-_0rj_MOBSuaEgZZkXwGvQlJLo1 Synopsis: It is the 1990s, the tape-cassette is dying, CDs will soon be the rage and a regular arranged marriage will turn out to be a perfect mismatch. Prem (Ayushmann Khurrana) is a shy music buff who runs a tape recording shop in Haridwar. Sandhya (Bhumi Pednekar) likes to dance to the band tunes at her own wedding. He has nightmares about drawing a blank at his English exam. She is about to carve a niche for herself as a teacher. But now, they are married and they are supposed to spend a lifetime together - and he is still trying to find balance on their scooter ride together. From overcoming his fear of the English language to dealing with an overbearing father, he discovers that his oversized wife, who he thought was a spanner in his spool, will actually lead him to something quite cool. #yrfnewreleases #dumlagakehaisha #yrf #yrf50 #yashraj #yashrajfilms #yrfmovies #yrfmusic #yashchopra #adityachopra #ayushmannkhurrana #bhumipednekar #sharatkatariya #maneeshsharma #anumalik #varungrover #monalithakur #papon #mohmohkedhaage #bollywood #lofimix © Yash Raj Films Pvt. Prem (Ayushmann Khurrana) is a shy music buff who runs a tape recording shop in Haridwar. Sandhya (Bhumi Pednekar) likes to dance to the band tunes at her own wedding. He has nightmares about drawing a blank at his English exam. She is about to carve a niche for herself as a teacher. But now, they are married and they are supposed to spend a lifetime together - and he is still trying to find balance on their scooter ride together.
